Literature.Title: Spermine-Conjugated Short Proline-Rich Lipopeptides as Broad-Spectrum Intracellular Targeting Antibacterial Agents.
Literature.Author: Dewangan RP, Verma DP, Verma NK, Gupta A, Pant G, Mitra K, Habib S, Ghosh JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>200µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-427(MIC=>200µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>200µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=>200µM)
